attributes.action: Driver CPC discounted rate for agency drivers
attributes.additional_details:
Discrimination towards agency/self employed drivers
1 they have to fund the full fee of the course
2 no discount is given
3 loose a days pay
4 terms of employment are less disadvantagous
5 Full time eployees get their tuition paid
6 Employments rights should be equal oppourtunities

Goverment should give a 50% discount towards agency/self employed staff
